name: Dr. Doom
masterStrike: Each Player with exactly 6 cards in hand reveals a Black Hero or puts 2 cards from their hand on top of their deck

name: Loki
masterStrike: Each Player Reveals Green Hero or gains a wound.

name: Magneto
masterStrike: Each Player Reveals an X-Men Hero or discards down to four cards.

name: Red Skull
masterStrike: Each Player KOs a Hero from their hand.

name: Authoritarian Iron Man
masterStrike: Authoritarian Iron Man fortifies the next city space to his right, starting with the Bridge. You can't fight him while there's a Villain in that space.

name: Baron Helmut Zero
masterStrike: Each player KOs a Villain from their Victory Pile. Any player who cannot do so gains a Wound.

name: Maria Hill, Director of SHIELD
masterStrike: Two S.H.I.E.L.D. Officers enter the city as 3 Attack Villains. When you fight them, gain them as Heroes.

name: Misty Knight
masterStrike: Each player reveals 4 cards with Recruit icons or gains a Wound.

name: Ragnarok
masterStrike: Each player says 'zero' or 'not zero.' Then, each player discards all their cards with that cost.

name: Apocalypse
masterStrike: Each player reveals their hand and puts all their Heroes that cost 1 or more on top of their deck.

name: Kingpin
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Marvel Knights Hero or discards their hand and draws 5 cards.

name: Mephisto
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Marvel Knights Hero or gains a Wound.

name: Mr. Sinister
masterStrike: Mr. Sinister captures a Bystander. Then each player with exactly 6 cards reveals a RED Hero or discards cards equal to the number of Bystanders Mr. Sinister has.

name: Stryfe
masterStrike: Stack this Master Strike next to Stryfe. Stryfe gets +1 Attack for each Master Strike stacked next to him. Each player reveals an X-Force Hero or discards a card at random.

name: Madelyne Pryor, Goblin Queen
masterStrike: Madelyne captures 4 Bystanders. If she already had any Bystanders before that, then each player gains a Wound.

name: Nimrod, Super Sentinel
masterStrike: Each player who does not reveal a Tech Hero must choose Recruit or Attack, then discard all their cards with that icon.

name: Wasteland Hulk
masterStrike: Cross-Dimensional Hulk Rampage

name: Zombie Green Goblin
masterStrike: Rise of the Living Dead. KO each Hero in the HQ that costs 7 or more. Then, each player discards a card for each Hero in the KO pile that costs 7 or more.

name: Immortal Emperor Zheng-Zhu
masterStrike: Each player reveals a Hero that costs 7 or more, or they discard down to 3 cards.

name: King Hyperion
masterStrike: King Hyperion enters the city if he was not already there. Then, he charges three spaces. Escape: Each player gains a wound. Put King Hyperion on the Mastermind space.

name: Shiklah, the Demon Bride
masterStrike: Reveal the top three cards of the Villain Deck. Put all the Scheme Twists you revealed on top of the Villain Deck. Put the rest on the bottom of that deck in random order.

name: Spider-Queen
masterStrike: Each player puts a Spider-Infected from their Victory Pile into an empty city space. Any player who cannot do so gains a Wound.
